description: Episode of Series "Royal Heritage the Story of Britains Builders and Collectors". Shows various aspects of the royal lives with special emphasis on their responsibilities towards the royal heritage of treasures and collections and the preservation of historic royal buildings. Also shows the Queen and Prince Phillip with their children and grandchildren.
